{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Handlink |model=AP-100 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/17/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point, CPE |fcc_id=TWS-AP-100 |ic_id= |pwr_v=18 |pwr_amp=0.66 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EMI-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68A16CWQB-25H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=hg directional |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Superwifi Network X |default_ssid_regex=^Superwifi Network [0-7]{1}$ |default_ip=10.59.100.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''AP-100 Smart Wi-Fi Access Point''
[http://www.handlink.com/products_AP-100.php Product page] "M01-"????"-X01" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. CPU: '''Atheros''' AR9344-BC2A
RAM: '''EtronTech''' EM68A16CWQB-25H / '''Winbond''' W9725G6JB-25 This device is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=953 '''Skyworks''' ( / '''SiGe''') SE2576L / 2576L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier modules]. The hardware of this device would appear to be the same (or very similar to) that of the [[Altai C1n Super WiFi CPE/AP]]. Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID format is stated to be '''Superwifi Network''' + a space + a number between 0 and 7. :A 00:19:BE ('''Altai''') OUI is shown as being used within the manual..
